name: Take 'em Out - Trashy Edition
description:
Welcome to Take 'em Out, a game where you control a plane to shoot the  flying trash and garbage. 

FULLSCREEN RECOMMENDED

INSTRUCTIONS:

Try to shoot as many trash as possible.  Failure to do that will result in the reduction of one life.  Lose all the lives, the game is over.

Try Collecting Powerups, like a Faster Plane and a Faster Shooting rate.

CONTROLS:

Use the Mouse to Move and Left-Click to Shoot

Made With Scratch.

#TeamSeas

Enjoy!
